name: 陳心怡
objective:
本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

scorePolicy:
The course adopts a 100 point scale for grading. Your grade will be based on the quality of your work in the following areas.

1.	Attendance & participation: 20%
2.	Writing assignments & in-class activities: 80%

Other Policy:

1.	Previewing the materials is essential for classroom discussion. 
2.	Attendance is required. Each unapproved absence and lateness will result in a 3-point deduction from the final grade. 
3.	Course assignments should be submitted by the due dates. Late assignments are not accepted and will result in 3-point deduction by each calendar day. 
4.	Plagiarism is not allowed in this course. Students who plagiarize will receive a zero for the course.
